title: Responding to Trump, Tehran bans travel of U.S. wrestlers to Iran
text: The decision marks the first action taken by Iran in response to Trump's executive order banning visas for citizens of seven predominantly Muslim countries, including Iran. Earlier this week, Iran said it would take retaliatory action. Ghasemi said the policy of the new U.S. administration left Iran no other choice but to ban the wrestlers.
summary:
The decision marks the first action taken by Iran in response to Trump's executive order banning visas for citizens of seven predominantly Muslim countries, including Iran.
Earlier this week, Iran said it would take retaliatory action.
Ghasemi said the policy of the new U.S. administration left Iran no other choice but to ban the wrestlers.
